overview: Vampire Anton Voytek's lair is disturbed by the ground breaking for a new church. Anton attempts to start a modern life using his hoarded wealth, but finds it's been confiscated by the authorities. He takes revenge on the architect responsible, who in turn, aided by a retired detective, tries to hunt down and destroy Anton.
tagline: No woman can resist him. No man can stand against him. A city trembles when he walks again... more romantic, more mysterious than ever!
title: Vampire
